lead_paragraph: The Yankees refused to trade the Class-AAA starter Ian Kennedy or Melky Cabrera for the Texas Rangers’ Eric Gagne, but did trade Scott Proctor to the Dodgers for infielder Wilson Betemit.
snippet: The Yankees refused to trade the Class-AAA starter Ian Kennedy or Melky Cabrera for the Texas Rangers’ Eric Gagne, but did trade Scott Proctor to the Dodgers for infielder Wilson Betemit.
